storyInfo: Eirene, president of the Truckers' Union, requested by Judge Lavinia, helps investigate the hit-and-run, only to learn that the culprit is her friendâ€”a truck driver named Sommer. Meanwhile, Lavinia has become suspicious of Demetri, the man who invited Leontuzzo to the banquet.

attributes.content: <p=2>December 5th, 1099</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: What are you shipping?
attributes.name: Dockworker

attributes.content: Wine.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Waybill number?
attributes.name: Dockworker

attributes.content: What's the company?
attributes.name: Dockworker

attributes.content: Sorry. Don't know what you mean.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The goods you're hauling there. What corporation owns them? How's that hard to understand?
attributes.name: Dockworker

attributes.content: Haha. You must be new. Doesn't understand how things work around here.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: S'alright. Listen and learn. You should ask, 'What famiglia are you with?'
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Sorry, signore. What's the company?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: ...Saluzzo Vino.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Right. Your information checks out. Go on ahead.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that, and don't try to bring the old ways over here. Look at the sign above the port.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You're in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: <p=2>November 6th, 1100    7:00 A.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Boss, you came just in time. I got something to discuss with you.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: We're not taking any trucks out today. We're gonna fix up the roads around camp.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: If Sandro blows another tire next time he backs up, he'll have no one to blame but his own bad luck, haha.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Also, the custom-made tent has arrived. We're planning to set it up near the western exit.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: The new campsite is huge. There's room for the awning, water purification system, and barbecue grill. It's in a relatively quiet area, which should help the new recruits adjust more easily.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: I also added an outdoor projector screen so that the people in the camp can enjoy a little entertainment.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: When I have time, I'll go rent some Wrankwood films... I know what you're gonna sayâ€”no mafia flicks.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: By the way, I heard city hall has already started building a new resettlement area?
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Haha, well, they'd better hurry upâ€”otherwise, I might not want to move out when the time comes.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Right now, the trucks can only park in the camp. Everyone has to live in the trucks. It's really inconvenient, especially for guys with families...
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: But at least we don't have to deal with those big Families anymore. These trucks belong to us. Standing together to protect them gives us a sense of security.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sometimes I look at the camp over there and think, 'Who would believe that this was a barren wasteland just a year ago?'
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: By the way, boss, why didn't you come back last night?
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: You all distracted me. I almost forgot what I was doing here!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Bring me the district headsâ€”Sandro, Ginter, Sommer...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sommer isn't here.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Huh? Isn't he off work today?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I told him so many times already, I get why he wants to bring Guri to Nuova Volsinii for treatment as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Guri is my little sister too. I told him I'd do my part to help. I told him to stop taking extra long hauls all the time.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Boss, don't get mad. It's probably not what you think.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: What about the unlucky loner?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: She isn't here either. I haven't seen her since last night.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: That's weird. Whatever. Gather up everybody still in camp. We need to help Judge Lavinia investigate some things.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The sun is shining brightly.
The cordoned-off area has turned the bustling street quiet. Bloodstains mingle with the tire tracks on the ground as police officers rush back and forth.
Nuova Volsinii is not as rainy as the other cities in Siracusa. Without the rain to obscure it, the accident scene stands out all the more strikingly.
...Have you made any more progress?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The surveillance around here is broken, so we could not obtain any video footage. We were forced to scour the area for physical evidence.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Here you can see the tire marks left by Signor Bellone's car and the other vehicle that has since left the scene.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The collision occurred at a corner where there's a bad blind spot. There's also a traffic light there though, so the two cars shouldn't have collided. And yet, both veered oddly at almost the same momentâ€”
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: That's when Signor Bellone's car was struck by the other vehicle, which quickly fled the scene.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: It may have been a routine traffic accident, but we cannot exclude the possibility that it was...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Have you learned anything new about our mystery vehicle?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's just as we concluded last nightâ€”a large box truck of some sort.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: I see. Delivery trucks, shuttle buses, fire trucks, specialized construction vehicles... 'Box trucks' of this size are rare in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've already asked Eirene to help me investigate. The truck drivers are much better equipped than we are to find clues.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia, Signor Bellone...
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: The fractures and internal bleeding have been addressed through surgery, but the severe concussion has left the patient in a coma, at least for now.
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: In a sense, we can't say the patient is out of mortal danger yet.
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: Will... will he recover?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: As a doctor, I will not promise anything... However, as a citizen of Nuova Volsinii, I sincerely hope Signor Bellone makes a full recovery, and I'll do my best to make that happen.
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: I wish you the best of luck, Judge Lavinia.
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: They did it. They made a move...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia, should we go grab some of the mafiosi, and thenâ€”
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Don't even think about it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's the famiglie's way; it is not our way.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Forgive me! But I think if anyone had a reason to harm Signor Bellone, it would be one of those famiglia bastards!
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: We shall find the culprit, no matter who they are. They must be brought to justice.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But who could it be?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The Saluzzos?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The Venezias?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The Medicis?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The Leotis?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia turns her gaze to the restaurant on the corner.
The restaurant is small, and the seats by the window face the middle of the road.
Demetri invited me to dinner tonight and I promised him I'd be there. I can't keep avoiding him forever, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon, what is wrong with all this...?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signor Antonio, I've already trimmed the stray fur on your ears and tail. The next step is applying the conditioner.
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: This might take a little while. Feel free to close your eyes and rest for a spell.
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: No problem. You just do your thing.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Is this your first time here?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Yes, yes it is. Carle said if your own personal nurse had not fallen ill... well, in any case it's my honor to serve you today.
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: Don't be nervous. You're doing a great job.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Thank you. Heh.
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: Our family has spent generations studying Lupo fur. We started as traveling craftsmen and eventually opened the first grooming center. It's been hundreds of years, and we've gathered plenty of expertise along the way!
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: Lupo fur is generally coarse with inner and outer layers, while Perro fur is much finer and softer. At first glance, they may seem similar, but in reality, they're worlds apart.
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: That's why I specially formulated this conditioning treatment for you. Its blend of rich botanical essences can help firm up the fur while still retaining key nutrients.
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: What do you think? Do you like it?
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: Of course. You've put so much care into this whole thing. Why wouldn't I be happy with it?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Signor Antonio, you are kind and gentle. You're not at all as scary as Carle said...
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: I think there must have been some misunderstanding. I'm just a simple businessman. Who would do business with a scary man?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Haha... By the way, Signor Antonio, would you like to try a semi-permanent styling for your ears and tail?
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: That way, their shape will be more defined and look better. Plus, no one will be able to tell you aren't a Lupoâ€”
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: Oh... hold on.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: It sounds like you have strong opinions about my ears and tail.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Well, I heard Carle say you wanted to look more like a Lupo.
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: Hah. You mean to say that I, as a lowly Perro, should rather look more like my own race?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: What kinda beastshit are you talking?!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Carle?
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: I... I just wanted to show Signor Antonio hereâ€”
attributes.name: Chatty Grooming Specialist

attributes.content: That's enough, shut your face! Get outta here!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Scusa, Antonio...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Not your fault.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Here's our shipping invoice for this month.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Antonio quickly scans the invoice and puts an 'X' on the signature line.
A batch of 'tires' is arriving at the warehouse today, and you're in charge of inspection, aren't you? Why are you still at the estate?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I'll head over right away. Don't worry, nothing will go wrong.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Where are we...? Wait...
Lemme go! Why did you bring me here?
Quiet, ragazzo!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Keep yellin' and I'll color the rest of your face to match that black eye!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Capone, keep an eye on him. I gotta go tell the boss.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Boss, we got a problem.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: There was a car accident at the port last night. Leontuzzo got hurt.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The Acting Mayor! That's big news, but what does it have to do with us?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The truck that hit Leontuzzo was hauling our 'tires'.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: It drove off before we could even answer.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The man paces the room, his heavy footsteps drowning out the sound of his labored breathing.
He walks over to the large oak cask and quickly downs three cups of brandy.
Antonio, right now you should be...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Wait, wait, wait. I despise impatience. It clouds our judgment.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Were there witnesses at the scene?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Just one. Capone and I brought him back here.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Good work.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Now, listen to me carefully:
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: First, keep an eye on everyone in the household. If anyone goes somewhere they shouldn't be going or is doing a job they shouldn't be doing, bring them to me immediately.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Keep a close watch on the other famiglie in the cityâ€”the Saluzzos, the Medicis, the Leotis... Figure out which famiglia seems the most nervous. They're the ones who made the move on Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I want to know who, at this particular moment in time, is so eager to upset the apple cart.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: And the truck from the accident... are we just not gonna look for it, or?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Go look for it, but don't do anything too drastic.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: As long as the truck itself wasn't defective, what does it matter who was driving, what cargo was being transported, or how it's connected to Venezia Trucking?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Go and reassure some of our other 'friendly' truck drivers. Those long-haulers are more prone to losing their composure than the average man.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Alright. I'll get right to it.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Wait a sec, Carle.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Gambino, you handle this. Bring some of the boys with you.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You got it, boss.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Antonio, Iâ€”I'm sorry. It was my mistake.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: No one could have predicted that sort of thing would happen.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You're supremely talented, Carle. You've been in this famiglia longer than I have. You oversee half the vehicle repair stations in Montelupe.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: If I were you, I'd probably be wondering myself: how ever would that Perro, Antonio, get so many opportunities, getting to manage the business of the new city on his own, if he hadn't married the old man's daughter?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I... don't...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Listen to me, Carle. All the cities, including Nuova Volsinii, have to follow the rules. Those who do not follow the rules... well... they don't get to walk away with decency.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: This is what the Don told me, and now I'm telling it to you.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Please give me another chance, Antonio.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The Don should arrive in Nuova Volsinii in the next day or two. I don't want him to be bothered with this nonsense, got it?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Oâ€”Of course, Signore! Thank you!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Wait a second. There's one more thing we need to discuss.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: That grooming specialist I had just now. I really don't like him.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I got it. I'll fire him at once.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: No, no. I don't mean that I dislike his work. I don't like him, personally.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: ...I got it. You won't see him again.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Did you find it?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Nope. We looked through several parking lots but didn't find any trucks that looked like they had been in an accident.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: The Truckers' Union owns thousands of vehicles, and almost none of them have been idle these past few days. If we checked them one by one, we wouldn't finish until after Carnevale was over!
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Boss, Judge Lavinia asked you to help find clues, but now you're targeting the Truckers' Union? It's almost like you think one of us hit the Mayor's car...
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: When it comes to big box trucks in Nuova Volsinii, who is more involved than us?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: There are plenty of other groups involved! There are the vehicle factories, the repair stations, the Nuova Volsinii Port...
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Besides, none of our trucks passed through that intersection at the time of the accident!
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Alright, Pedro. Obviously, I do not believe the folks from the union would do something like that. This is just for peace of mind.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Signor Bellone and Judge Lavinia are both good people, are they not?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Proving that we had nothing to do with this will save them a lot of time and effort. It'll help the police solve the case faster and find the real culprit!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: That's true...
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: By the way, have you gotten in touch with Sommer? He's covering several districts in the south, so having him check things out would be quicker.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Strange... Never mind, let's focus on what's at hand first.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Alright, we'll keep searching.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene? It's... it's me.
attributes.name: Terrified Truck Driver

attributes.content: Sommer, you've been here, in the camp?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Didn't you hear what we were talking about? Why didn't you come out?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Why are your clothes all torn... and what's with the scratches on your face?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Last night...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: That truck that hit Leontuzzo last night.... don't tell me...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Yes... I was the driver...
attributes.name: Sommer
